resources.string: A basic sample that uses Android Data Binding library to display a POJO.
A basic sample of an observable object that updates the UI when you hit the okay button. The onClick method will set the team\'s name that will fires the notifyPropertyChanged.
A basic sample of an observable field that updates the UI when you hit the okay button. The onClick method will set the team\'s ObservableField value that will update the UI automatically.
Two-way binding in a text field
A basic sample of a bidirectional data biding using a TextWatcher bound to a text field. The TextWatcher is watching for text changes in order to set the observable field on afterTextChanged(...).
A basic sample of data binding using custom binding tags.
